User is switching to Meta Ai scavenger hunt activity.

User says Meta Ai gives good, relevant answers and expands on the topic by providing more information than what was asked for. Makes asking follow-up questions easy for the user. They appreciate it’s ability to converse back and forth with user in a way that is helpful.

User says the only difference in using meta Ai with the gen 2 versus the MR glasses is that there isn’t a picture provided with these glasses but user doesn’t care much for the images anyways. Other than that, user says the experience of doing the scavenger hunt is the same on both glasses.
User is switching to the light green chair. Beginning listening to music on Spotify and messaging in WhatsApp.

User received the message in WhatsApp and was able to read it, but when attempting to reply, user got a message saying “Error, check the app”. We disconnected WhatsApp from the glasses and reconnected it again.
Reconnecting WhatsApp fixed the issue. User has resumed sending messages back and forth on WhatsApp.
User thought a message reply sent but it did not. Recipient sent 2 messages but user only heard one through the glasses. User has to refer to the phone to read the messages to resume conversation.
The music will pause for 5 seconds when receiving a message and when creating a reply.
“It will read out the messages to me but it won’t re-read them to me even if I ask it too. So I miss some of the messages coming in.”
